content:
I have a large IPython notebook with multiple figures and text, and I want to export it to an HTML file. However, I want to do this without including the code in the exported file. I've attempted to use the following command for conversion: 

```ipython
ipython nbconvert --to html notebook.ipynb
```

But this command also exports the code. Is there a way to convert the notebook to HTML without including the code?
